resources.string: Use the Settings menu to change the display theme if your device is running Android 3.x or 4.x. To Change Your Screen Size. Long Press Some Buttons To find out what exactly they do.
Only display unread items in the list
This App helps Diabetes and HBP patients to make a follow up On Their Health Life Styles As Pertain Diabetes And HBP, and Also Some Other Diseases. .
Range Has No Recomendation.Seek Medical Assistance Or Try Again

Your blood glucose level is normal. To keep it that way, Take lots of water at least 8 glasses a day. Take a variety of fruits like apples, bananas, pineapples etc. Have a Balanced diet comprising carbohydrates, proteins, vitamins,minerals,fibre etc. Take medication regularly. Do exercises .

Your Blood Glucose is low. To increase you can choose some of the options below. Take 1/2 a glass of fruit juice e.g. Apple, passion fruit, orange Take a non-diet soda. Take foods with carbohydrates like rice, potato chips, bread etc. Take 1 tablespoon of sugar dissolved in water. Take 1 tablespoon of honey in tea. Take 3 0r 4 tablets of glucose. Eat 3 or 4 hard candies. Eat mixed foods like peanut butter and crakers. Repeat testing after 15 minutes. If the results are persistent for 2 days in a row seek medical help.

Your blood glucose is high. Incase you have type 1.... Do not do exercise. Take a dose of insulin and can consider some options below: Otherwise you can,
Take plenty of water that is 8 glasses a day. Do more exercises. Reduce on the amount of carbohydrate foods such as potato chips, bread , and also fatty foods like red meat , chicken etc. Take medication regularly and check if it is not expired. Should relax. Repeat the test after 15 minutes... If the results are persistent for 2 days in a row seek medical help.

Your blood glucose level is normal. To keep it that way. Take lots of water atleast 8 glasses a day. Take a variety of fruits like apples, bananas, pineapples etc. Have a Balanced diet comprising cabohydrates, proteins, vitamins,minerals,fibre etc. Take medication regularly. Do exercises .

Your blood glucose level is very high..\n
CALL YOUR DOCTOR OR SEEK EMERGENCY ATTENTION.!!!

Your blood glucose is very low.
You should administer a Glucagon injection.
Let a friend or a family member help you if you can\'t do it on your own.
If it persists CALL YOUR DOCTOR !!!!

You have prediabetes.....
To avoid it from developing into type 2.
You should watch your weight by doing exercises.
You should take a balanced diet including saturated fat and soluble fiber.

Blood Pressure is extremely high.
You need Urgent Medication to prevent a Heart Attack or a Fatal Stroke!!! and see a doctor .
Avoid: • Any stressful situations. • Sedentary(lack of adquate physical activity). PLEASE HAVE HEALTHY BALANCED DIET MEALS TO KEEP BODY BALANCE AND TAKE LOTS OF WATER TOO!! (Proteins,Carbohydrates,Irons/Minerals,Fibre,Vitamins like Friuts and Vegetables) Some Symptoms are; Bloat(swelling ), Weakening(lacking physical strength).

Blood Pressure is Too high. You are advised to take Medication and seek medical attention
YOU NEED TO DO MORE PHYSICAL ACTIVITIES LIKE:. • Try taking long supervised walks. • if you have an office job, take short trips to get water or to the bathrooms to prevent(Sedentary). • You can also do light exercising. MAKE SURE TO TALK TO A INSTRUCTOR ABOUT YOUR PROBLEM BEFORE STARTING! • Sedentary(lack of adquate physical activity)
Avoid: • Any stressful situations. • Sedentary(lack of adquate physical activity).

Borderline blood pressure. Your blood pressure is mildly high. You are advised to take Medication or see a doctor to prescibe medication.
YOU NEED TO DO MORE PHYSICAL ACTIVITIES LIKE:. • Try taking long supervised walks. • if you have an office job, take short trips to get water or to the bathrooms to prevent(Sedentary). • You can also do light exercising.

CONGRATS. YOUR BLOOD PRESSURE IS VERY NORMAL AND HEALTHY!!
You are advised to take your regular Medication and see a doctor periodically as advised. PLEASE HAVE HEALTHY BALANCED DIET MEALS TO KEEP BODY BALANCE AND TAKE LOTS OF WATER TOO!! (Proteins,Carbohydrates,Irons/Minerals,Fibre,Vitamins like Friuts and Vegetables).
Please continue doing regular exercises, and keep in shape.

You blood pressure is Too Low.
You are advised to take Medication or see a Doctor to prescribe medication to prevent syncope or fainting!!
PLEASE HAVE HEALTHY BALANCED DIET MEALS TO KEEP BODY BALANCE AND TAKE LOTS OF WATER TOO!! (Proteins,Carbohydrates,Irons/Minerals,Fibre,Vitamins like Friuts and Vegetables).

You blood pressure is Extremely Low.
You are advised to immediately take Medication or see a Doctor to prescribe medication to prevent syncope or fainting!!
PLEASE HAVE HEALTHY BALANCED DIET MEALS TO KEEP BODY BALANCE AND TAKE LOTS OF WATER TOO!! (Proteins,Carbohydrates,Irons/Minerals,Fibre,Vitamins like Friuts and Vegetables).
Suppress titlebars on screens(Works with Android 3.X And Above)
Enable light background theme(Works with Android 3.X And Above)
Always Show User Demo on startup of the App
Enables You To Access The Diabetes User Interface To Enter Measurements For Blood Sugar Levels.
Enables You To Access The HBP User Interface To Enter Measurements For Blood Pressure Levels.
